lead_paragraph: Robert (Paddy Considine, Cinderella Man), is a man trying to recover from a messy divorce by seeking solace in a small town.  Robert becomes fascinated by the apparent domestic bliss of Jenny (Julia Stiles, The Bourne Trilogy), who he secretly watch
